API Docs for Sandy 3D Engine haXe Port, ver. 3.1.1

sandy.events.SandyEvent

type
class
extends
flash.events.Event
version
3.1
Conatains custom Sandy events.

Static Variables

CONTAINER_CREATED(inline,null) : String

Defines the value of the type property of a containerCreated event object. Not in use?

LIGHT_ADDED(inline,null) : String

Defines the value of the type property of a lightAdded event object.

LIGHT_COLOR_CHANGED(inline,null) : String

Defines the value of the type property of a lightColorChanged event object.

LIGHT_UPDATED(inline,null) : String

Defines the value of the type property of a lightUpdated event object.

QUEUE_COMPLETE(inline,null) : String

Defines the value of the type property of a queueComplete event object. Deprecated, use QueueEvent.QUEUE_COMPLETE instead.

QUEUE_LOADER_ERROR(inline,null) : String

Defines the value of the type property of a queueLoaderError event object. Deprecated, use QueueEvent.QUEUE_LOADER_ERROR instead.

SCENE_CULL(inline,null) : String

Indicates the scene has been culled.

SCENE_RENDER(inline,null) : String

Defines the value of the type property of a scene_render event object.

SCENE_RENDER_DISPLAYLIST(inline,null) : String

Indicates the display list has been rendered.

SCENE_RENDER_FINISH(inline,null) : String

Defines the value of the type property of a scene_render_finish event object.

SCENE_UPDATE(inline,null) : String

Indicates the scene has been updated.

Constructor

new()
parameters
type The event type; indicates the action that caused the event.
bubbles Specifies whether the event can bubble up the display list hierarchy.
cancelable Specifies whether the behavior associated with the event can be prevented.
